    • categoriesExisting

      public List<Category> categoriesExisting(List<Category> categories)
      Description copied from interface: iCategoryService
      Ensures that the provided categories exist in the database. If a category does not exist, it is created and added to the list of existing categories.
      Specified by:
      categoriesExisting in interface iCategoryService
      Parameters:
      categories - The list of categories to ensure existence.
      Returns:
      A list of categories with updated IDs (existing or newly created).
